metadata.title: CVE-2021-23556 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The package guake before 3.8.5 are vulnerable to Exposed Dangerous Methodor Function due to the exposure of execute_command andexecute_command_by_uuid methods via the d-bus interface, which makes itpossible for a malicious user to run an arbitrary command via the d-busmethod. **Note:** Exploitation requires the user to have installed anothermalicious program that will be able to send dbus signals or run terminalcommands.

criterions.comment: guake package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
